posts.name: Michelle
posts.cooked:
Weâ€™re releasing the Signal 7.55 beta soon. If youâ€™re interested in participating, join the beta group here.

Share your feedback on the latest changes:

  • Even more backups work
  • Various stickers/images/gifs fixes

Complete list of new commits since 7.54.1:

https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-Android/compare/v7.54.1â€¦main

Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Comparing v7.54.1...main Â· signalapp/Signal-Android Â· GitHub
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.54 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.55.0 (157900)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

34 new commits since 7.54.1:

Show commits

  • Add foreground service when restoring backup media. [1]

  • Add support for resizing pane on main activity. [2]

  • Fix various attachment reuse bugs causing archive issues. [3]

  • Don't bother with the empty item if we are on the new calling UI. [4]

  • Add JUnit-based database consistency test. [5]

  • Bump to libsignal v0.79.0 [6]

  • Use same cipher version for registration and linking provisioning messages. [7]

  • Fix navigation bar gap when opening keyboard in split pane view. [8]

  • Ensure that we clear incrementalMac's that will be invalidated during archive. [9]

  • Ignore expensive AttachmentCipherTests. [10]

    They can take up to 15 seconds to run, and they've already proven
    their usefulness. We can un-ignore them temporarily if we ever need
    to make changes.

  • Fix IAP insertion timestamp. [11]

  • Update logging of timestamps in Remote Backups section. [12]

  • Add media restore tier to debuglogs. [13]

  • Run unit tests in parallel. [14]

  • Check remaining attachment size before launching service. [15]

  • Convert ChatsSettings screen to compose. [16]

  • Add key reuse to create keys operation in backup job. [17]

  • Calling: Remove unnecessary hangups [18]

  • Migrate DataAndStorageFragment to compose. [19]

  • Clear incrementalMac if we discover it's bad during playback. [20]

  • Don't set archive states when importing from no-media backup. [21]

  • Ensure that debuglog search queries are escaped. [22]

    Thank you to Aref Alotaibi <arefalotaibi.cs@gmail.com> for discovering
    and reporting this issue!

  • Add SendDeliveryReceiptJob to the reserved runner. [23]

  • Add a reserved runner for attachment operations. [24]

  • Add additional logging around JobRunners. [25]

  • Allow NEEDS_RESTORE attachments to be considered as 'couldBeOnArchiveCdn'. [26]

  • Add sticker specific restore flow and fix archive related sticker bugs. [27]

  • Choose manual profile over scheduled profile if active. [28]

  • Update unsupported message UI. [29]

  • Revert "Disable all fixes for large image loading." [30]

  • Re-enable large image loading. [31]

  • Remove phantom restore media notification. [32]

  • Update translations and other static files. [33]

  • Bump version to 7.55.0 [34]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Android v7.54.1â€¦v7.55.0

Localization changes

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked: Given that image fixes seem to be within scope are you guys looking for logs for when the screen flashes black when opening an image?

Opened a group and and backed out again to the conversation list. It took several seconds to update the view an mark the unread messages (1756331547587, 1756331551126) as read, i.e. remove the little badge with the number 2.

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.55.0/e7790bf7da52824ecaa3b7a0dc4a8fccd46450f72101da93dad01c90fafa7a19

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.49 release

posts.cooked:
When using WebSocket for notifications, the WebSocket connection breaks if the internet connection temporarly drops. Once an internet connection is restored, the WebSocket connection stays broken until signal is opened manually. It would be better if Signal periodicaly checked the if the Websocket is still up and and if not it should automaticaly restore it.

Battery optimisation is off.

posts.name: ðŸ‘ŠðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ðŸ”¥

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.55.0/c84edadf8d372a6a7974b8dfd368acb063bf9a8882776e153466ef7dace46e05

posts.name: Hugo
posts.cooked: Also, we donâ€™t ask for ETAs here, the Signal Team will prioritize the bugs internally

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.56 release.
